title: Lagss on mac. (macbook pro i5, 2015)
body:
for some reason i get huge lags to a point where i cant move and the screen instantly turns white. Everything is okay when choosing champion and i dont get any lags there but when the game starts it instantly gives me huge lags and i cant move its like my screen is stuck however i can hear whats going on, i can actually flash heal however i cant see my screen. i tried everything can someone please try and help me because im actually trying to get frustrated from this, please someone help me ....
not only that i actually formated the mac and it still didnt work.
* I had enough*

replies.body:
You've got a few threads on this minutes of each other which can cause some clutter, so just one is enough!  I've been seeing a few reports on this and found that some players have had issues as a result of hot corners.  What happens if you try disabling [hot corners](http://osxdaily.com/2016/08/10/disable-hot-corners-mac/)?  As an additional troubleshooting step, does your FPS improve by switching to Windowed mode instead of fullscreen?  

Those could be some factors, but you could be going through general wear and tear too, which our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can help out with.  Let me know if that helps.
